match: multiplier >= 3f -> Color(0xFFE91E63) // Pink for high multipliers
notes: Prefer themed colors from Material 3 colorScheme

match: multiplier >= 2f -> Color(0xFFFF9800) // Orange for medium multipliers
notes: Prefer themed colors from Material 3 colorScheme

match: points >= 50 -> Color(0xFF9C27B0) // Purple for high points
notes: Prefer themed colors from Material 3 colorScheme

match: points >= 20 -> Color(0xFF2196F3) // Blue for medium points
notes: Prefer themed colors from Material 3 colorScheme

match: category == TaskCategory.PRACTICE_EXAM -> Color(0xFFFF5722) // Deep orange for exams
notes: Prefer themed colors from Material 3 colorScheme

match: category == TaskCategory.GRAMMAR -> Color(0xFF4CAF50) // Green for grammar
notes: Prefer themed colors from Material 3 colorScheme

match: else -> Color(0xFF607D8B) // Blue grey for standard
notes: Prefer themed colors from Material 3 colorScheme
